DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this research study is to evaluate the safety and feasibility of the Radial Reload Stapler during open LAR for rectal cancer. The surgeon will complete questionnaires relating to the function of the device.
DOC.brief_title: Radial Reload Open LAR Case Series
DOC.criteria: 1. The subject is able to understand and sign Informed Consent Form. 2. The subject is between 1885 years of age. 3. The subject is anticipated to undergo a resection of the rectum with anastomosis below the peritoneal reflection for the treatment of rectal cancer. 4. The subject is anticipated to undergo mobilization and stapling of the rectum through an open incision. 1. Any female patient, who is pregnant, suspected pregnant, or nursing. 2. The participant is unable or unwilling to comply with the study requirements, followup schedule. 3. The participant has comorbidities which, in the opinion of the investigator, will not be appropriate for the study.
